TEXT.English: Develop Secret Codes: Members can only trade technologies with other members, every member receives a free Great Sage if they can pay 25[ICON_GOLD]
TEXT.French: Développer des Codes Secrets[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Les membres ne peuvent échanger leurs technologies qu'avec les autres membres.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Un Sage illustre est fourni à tout membre qui paie 25[ICON_GOLD]
TEXT.German: Geheimcode entwickeln - Mitglieder können Technologien nur zwischen Mitgliedern tauschen, jedes Mitglied das 25[ICON_GOLD] Zahlt bekommt einen freien großen Forscher
TEXT.Italian: Develop Secret Codes: Members can only trade technologies with other members, every member receives a free Great Sage if they can pay 25[ICON_GOLD]
TEXT.Spanish: Develop Secret Codes: Members can only trade technologies with other members, every member receives a free Great Sage if they can pay 25[ICON_GOLD]

TEXT.English: Enlist the Nightwatch: A Nightwatch unit is provided to every member who pays 25[ICON_GOLD]
TEXT.French: Enrôler la Garde de Nuit - Un Garde de Nuit est fourni à tout membre qui paie 25[ICON_GOLD]
TEXT.German: Nachtwache anwerben - Jedes Mitglied das 25[ICON_GOLD] Zahlt bekommt eine Nachtwache
TEXT.Italian: Enlist the Nightwatch: A Nightwatch unit is provided to every member who pays 25[ICON_GOLD]
TEXT.Spanish: Enlist the Nightwatch: A Nightwatch unit is provided to every member who pays 25[ICON_GOLD]

TEXT.English: Open Markets: Trade Routes ([ICON_TRADE]) with all foreign cities
TEXT.French: Marchés Ouverts - Routes Commerciales ([ICON_TRADE]) avec Toutes les Villes Etrangères
TEXT.German: Offene Märkte - Handelswege ([ICON_TRADE]) zu allen fremden Städten
TEXT.Italian: Open Markets: Trade Routes ([ICON_TRADE]) with all foreign cities
TEXT.Spanish: Open Markets: Trade Routes ([ICON_TRADE]) with all foreign cities

TEXT.English: Fund Dissidents: Could cause unhappiness in the cities of non-Undercouncil members
TEXT.French: Fomenter des Troubles - Peut causer du mécontentement dans les villes des non-Membres du Conseil Souterrain
TEXT.German: Dissidenten unterstützen - Kann Unzufriedenheit in Städten von nicht-Ratsmitgliedern verursachen
TEXT.Italian: Fund Dissidents: Could cause unhappiness in the cities of non-Undercouncil members
TEXT.Spanish: Fund Dissidents: Could cause unhappiness in the cities of non-Undercouncil members

TEXT.English: Setup a Gambling Ring: Reduces the production cost of Gambling Houses by 75%, increases global crime by 5%
TEXT.French: Intaller un Cercle de Jeu - Réduit le coût de production des Maisons de Jeu de 75%, augmente le crime global de 5%
TEXT.German: Glücksspielerring aufbauen - Reduziert die Produktionskosten von Glücksspielhäusern um 75%, erhöht die weltweite Verbrechenrate um 5%
TEXT.Italian: Setup a Gambling Ring: Reduces the production cost of Gambling Houses by 75%, increases global crime by 5%
TEXT.Spanish: Setup a Gambling Ring: Reduces the production cost of Gambling Houses by 75%, increases global crime by 5%

TEXT.French: Déclarer la Mana de Mort Hors-la-Loi

TEXT.English: Force Open Borders between all members
TEXT.French: Forcer les Libre Passage entre tous les Membres
TEXT.German: Offene Grenzen erzwingen zwischen allen Ratsmitgliedern
TEXT.Italian: Force Open Borders between all members
TEXT.Spanish: Force Open Borders between all members

TEXT.English: Elect a Head Councilor-Can propose resolutions
TEXT.French: Élire un Haut Conseiller - Peut proposer des résolutions
TEXT.Italian: Elect a Head Councilor-Can propose resolutions
TEXT.Spanish: Elect a Head Councilor-Can propose resolutions

TEXT.English: Single Currency: +1 Trade Route ([ICON_TRADE]) in all cities
TEXT.French: Monnaie Unique - +1 Route Commerciale ([ICON_TRADE]) dans toutes les Villes
TEXT.Italian: Single Currency: +1 Trade Route ([ICON_TRADE]) in all cities
TEXT.Spanish: Single Currency: +1 Trade Route ([ICON_TRADE]) in all cities

TEXT.English: Setup Slave Trade: Members can buy and sell slaves, increase global crime by 5%
TEXT.French: Installer le marché aux esclaves -les Membres peuvent acheter et vendre des esclaves, augmente le crime global de 5%
TEXT.German: Sklavenhandel aufbauen - Mitglieder können Sklaven kaufen und verkaufen, erhöht die weltweite Verbrechenrate um 5%
TEXT.Italian: Setup Slave Trade: Members can buy and sell slaves, increase global crime by 5%
TEXT.Spanish: Setup Slave Trade: Members can buy and sell slaves, increase global crime by 5%

TEXT.English: Setup Smuggling Ring: +1 Trade Route ([ICON_TRADE]) in all cities, enables the Smugglers' Port building, increases global crime by 5%
TEXT.French: Installer un Cercle de Contrebande - +1 Route Commerciale ([ICON_TRADE]) dans Toutes les Villes, Permet la construction du Port de Contrebandiers, augmente le crime global de 5%
TEXT.German: Schmugglering aufbauen - +1 Handelsweg ([ICON_TRADE]) in alle Städte, schaltet das Gebäude Schmugglerhafen frei, erhöht die weltweite Verbrechenrate um 5%
TEXT.Italian: Setup Smuggling Ring: +1 Trade Route ([ICON_TRADE]) in all cities, enables the Smugglers' Port building, increases global crime by 5%
TEXT.Spanish: Setup Smuggling Ring: +1 Trade Route ([ICON_TRADE]) in all cities, enables the Smugglers' Port building, increases global crime by 5%
